NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said. "He's been in tremendous agony." Allen Iverson spent 10 seasons in Philadelphia before bouncing through Denver and Detroit, ending up in Memphis last season.

notes, Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell said that Bush Administration officials are "admirers" of Ben Ali and Donald Rumsfeld of Defense Donald Rumsfeld said the country provided" constructive leadership in the world": It is worth rewinding and noting some choice words that former US secretary of state Colin Powell had to say about the country when he visited in December 2003.
